## Source: amazon-inspector (6dea39f25cc72cc9ab080d6f35ef68c9a061a8df5fe184194798109dad36faa5)
The package magic-poc was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (dc07633fe576722d0fb4d3e2f9c60c09d23564789e3b78dc0f6ed3c3d371da65)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'magic-poc' @ 0.1.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
